name: Hot Tea
description: Our Hot Tea is brewed fresh with quality tea leaves and dry ginger. A perfect blend to keep you refreshed and energized throughout the day.

name: Filter Coffee
description: Brewed with fresh milk and our signature blend, our Filter Coffee delivers the true South Indian taste — strong, smooth, and satisfying.

name: Rose Milk
description: Cup Time's Cold Rose Milk is a perfect fusion of chilled milk, natural rose essence, and a touch of real rose petals.

name: Sugar Juice
description: Cup Time's Sugar Juice is a warm, wholesome drink made by blending fresh hot milk with natural sugar cane extracts.

name: Karupatti Sukku Coffee
description: Karupatti Sukku Coffee is a traditional South Indian wellness drink made with karupatti (palm jaggery) and sukku (dry ginger) — served hot and without milk.

name: Strawberry Thick Shake
description: Creamy strawberry thick shake made with fresh strawberries, rich milk, and natural sweeteners for the perfect indulgent treat.

name: Palm Choco Thick Shake
description: Rich and creamy palm chocolate thick shake blended with natural palm jaggery and premium cocoa for an authentic South Indian dessert experience.

name: Regional Snacks
description: We celebrate local flavors with our handpicked selection of regional snacks — freshly sourced, authentically made and perfectly paired with your favourite hot beverages.
